Description: Signup for our store newsletter Our informative newsletter brings you tips, advice and news on the topics of gold, jewelry, fine gems, precious metals from Long Island's oldest established jewelry buying company and pawn shop. sign up here PRODUCT DESCRIPTION This is a 100% guaranteed authentic, antique, estate, circa 1920's Waltham pocket with a 43.15 MM case diameter. The watch is in mint condition. We opened the case to get pictures of the movement. Otherwise, the pocket watch appears to be unused. The inside case back still has the original frost polish. The 14K white gold case has engraved designs and yellow gold accents on the back. The watch has a silvered dial and sub dial with metallic blue hands and gold tone markers. The acrylic crystal is in excellent condition, and the mechanical manual wind, Waltham 17 jewel movement runs perfectly. However, we cannot guarantee long term accuracy on antique watches. The watch weighs a total of 57.7 grams and comes in a new, generic box. 22311 home appraisals sales tax intl buyers about us contact returns feedback Empire Jewelers has been business for more than 25 years, and specializes in fine jewelry, diamonds, gold, sterling silver, estate and vintage jewelry, coins and other precious metals. When you purchase valuable jewelry online, we know you are putting your trust in what you hope is a reputable company. Our mission is to provide honest, accurate wholesale prices and to provide you with a buying experience that is above your expectations. The appraisal staff of Empire Jewelers is educated by the GIA (Gemological Institute of America), ensuring professional expertise in the valuation of the fine jewelry sold here. We are certified, licensed and bonded, and bank references are available. We encourage you to request our references, ask us questions and read through our customer feedback. Our 100% feedback rating on eBay includes many items sold for between $3,000 and $50,000. Empire Jewelers is the largest wholesaler of jewelry from store close-outs, manufacturers buyouts and estates in Long Island, New York. We don’t claim to have everything. But, what we do offer is of the highest standards of quality, at unbeatable, true wholesale prices. SHIPPING: We offer FREE standard shipping within the United States (unless otherwise stated). Monday-Friday, items will ship same day if payment is cleared by 1pm Eastern time. PAYMENTS: We ship to confirmed addresses only. No exceptions.

ReturnPolicy.Description: Item must be returned in the same condition it was received.  Any shipping fees are not refundable.

Title: Vintage Waltham new old stock pocket watch 14K 2 tone gold 44 MM C. 1920's deco!
